coredata.dc:title: Framework for the Delivery of Information System Due Diligence

abstract.ce:para: The IS field lacks a scientifically based analytical tool for delivering IS due diligence. Due Diligence is the activity of identifying and measuring the risks and increasing the likelihood of productive investment. In this article, we propose a framework for IS due diligence development based on our generalized experiences conducting IS due diligence in more than 60 banks and financial organizations in Europe. © 2013 Copyright Taylor & Francis Group, LLC.

item-info.copyright: Copyright 2013 Elsevier B.V., All rights reserved.

citation-title.titletext: Framework for the Delivery of Information System Due Diligence

affiliation.organization: Faculty of Computer and Information Science

abstract.ce:para: The IS field lacks a scientifically based analytical tool for delivering IS due diligence. Due Diligence is the activity of identifying and measuring the risks and increasing the likelihood of productive investment. In this article, we propose a framework for IS due diligence development based on our generalized experiences conducting IS due diligence in more than 60 banks and financial organizations in Europe. © 2013 Copyright Taylor & Francis Group, LLC.
